metadata.title: CVE-2023-21035 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In multiple functions of BackupHelper.java, there is a possible way for anapp to get permissions previously granted to another app with the samepackage name due to a permissions bypass. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android-13Android ID: A-184847040

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
